posts.post_content:
Up for sale or trade are 18 raw T-206 cards listed and pictured below.  The group includes 7 x Minor League, 2 x Southern League and 1 x HOF.   Mixture of Piedmont, Old Mill, Polar Bear and Sweet Caporal backs. Sorry, the scanner is not the best.

I am asking $325 ($18/card) via PayPal friend payment and will listen to offers.  At this time, I prefer to sell/trade as a group.  Trade offers are also welcome.  I am interested in pre-1940 Pirates.

Bastian   San AntonioPiedmontFactory 25/350Southern League
